Dr. Peter Craig’s Website

Hello! Welcome to Dr. Peter Craig’s website! I am a postdoc in astronomy working at Michigan State University, with a focus on multiwavelength observations of classical novae. For more information about me, check out the About Me page. If you’re interested in my research, take a look at my Research page.
